articles.title: HOLDCO ASSET MANAGEMENT RELEASES PRESENTATION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF COMERICA INC.
articles.mainIdea: HOLDCO ASSET MANAGEMENT RELEASES PRESENTATION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF COMERICA INC.
articles.summary: PR Newswire: HOLDCO ASSET MANAGEMENT RELEASES PRESENTATION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF COMERICA INC.. HoldCo Asset Management, LP ("HoldCo"), a Florida-based investment firm managing approximately $2.6 billion in regulatory assets under management, released a presentation to the Board of Directors of Comerica Inc. entitled "When The Bank Was Healthy But The Board Got Scared."
